backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the RevGrid app, defining data types (UserProfile, Post, Event, Build, MarketplaceListing, etc.) and CRUD/query methods for users, posts, comments, messages, events, builds, marketplace listings, follows, and likes, with access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the actor state from OldActor (without marketplace listings) to NewActor by adding an empty marketplaceListings map while preserving all other state.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing key frontend component files, describing LandingPage, AuthGate, Layout, and index.html at a high level.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that sets the page title to 'RevReel' and mounts the React app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree for the entire app, mapping all page components (Home, Reels, Discover, Events, Profile, Messages, Mechanics, Builds, Create) under an AuthGate-wrapped Layout root route.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate that shows a loading splash while initializing, the LandingPage for unauthenticated users, a profile setup form for new users without a profile, and renders children for fully authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with Home, Reels, Create (opens CreatePostSheet), Events, and Profile tabs, highlighting the active route and rendering a prominent circular Create button.
frontend/src/components/CommentsSheet.ts: A bottom sheet component that displays and allows posting comments for a given post, fetching comments via query hooks and supporting keyboard/button submission.
A bottom sheet presenting four content creation options (Feed Post, Reel, Build Showcase, Mechanic Question) that navigate to their respective creation routes on selection.
frontend/src/components/EditProfileModal: A dialog modal for editing the current user's display name, car info, and bio, pre-populated from their profile and saved via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: A full-screen landing page with a background image, RevGrid branding, and an Internet Identity login button that shows a loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main app shell that composes TopBar, an affiliate parts banner, a routed main content area via Outlet, and BottomNav.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: A feed post card displaying author info, post content, and action buttons for liking, commenting, following, and sharing, with optimistic like state.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: A fixed top navigation bar that shows a dynamic page title based on the current route along with message and notification icon buttons.
frontend/src/components/UserListItem.tsx: A list item component displaying a user's avatar, name, and car info with a follow/unfollow button that navigates to the user's profile on click.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing login/logout state via DFINITY's AuthClient and exposing identity, status flags, and login/clear functions to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend data fetching and mutations, covering user profiles, posts, comments, messages, events, and build showcases via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures a dark automotive-themed design system with OKLCH CSS variables, and defines utility classes for effects like amber glow, glass cards, and racing stripes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility module exporting a Tailwind class merger (`cn`) and timestamp formatting helpers that convert nanosecond bigint timestamps to human-readable relative or absolute date strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/BuildDetailPage.tsx: Page component displaying a single build showcase with an image gallery, build details, and a comment section supporting adding new comments for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/BuildsPage.tsx: Page component listing all build showcases in a two-column image grid with navigation to individual build details and a button to create a new build.
frontend/src/pages/ChatThreadPage.tsx: Displays a direct message conversation thread between the current user and a recipient, with message rendering, auto-scroll to bottom, and a send message input.
frontend/src/pages/CreateBuildPage.tsx: Form page for creating a new car build showcase with title, description, and specs fields, navigating to the build detail page on success.
frontend/src/pages/CreateEventPage.tsx: Form page for creating a car meet event with title, location, date/time, and description fields, converting the date to nanoseconds before submission.
frontend/src/pages/CreateFeedPostPage.ts: Form page for creating a feed-type post with a caption and comma-separated tags, submitting via the useCreatePost hook.
frontend/src/pages/CreateMechanicQuestio: Form page for posting a mechanic question with a detailed description and tags, submitting as a mechanic-type post.
frontend/src/pages/CreateReelPage.tsx: Form page for creating a short-form reel post with a caption and tags, submitting as a reel-type post and navigating to the reels page on success.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: A discovery page with a search bar for finding users and a tabbed grid view for browsing all posts, builds, reels, mechanic posts, and events. Clicking a grid item navigates to the corresponding detail page.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Displays full details for a single event (image, date, location, attendee count, description) and allows the current user to mark themselves as attending.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Lists all car meet events with a hero image, a create-event button, and a scrollable list showing each event's thumbnail, date, location, and attendee count.
frontend/src/pages/FollowersPage.tsx: Shows a list of followers for a given user profile by fetching follower IDs and rendering each as a UserListItem component.
frontend/src/pages/FollowingPage.tsx: Shows a list of users that a given profile is following, fetching followee IDs and rendering each as a UserListItem component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The main feed page that fetches and renders all posts as PostCard components with skeleton loading states and an empty-state prompt to create the first post.
frontend/src/pages/MechanicsPage.tsx: Displays a mechanics Q&A feed page with a hero image, an 'Ask a Question' button, and a list of mechanic-type posts fetched via useGetFeed. Each question shows an image or icon, caption, author, timestamp, and tags.
frontend/src/pages/MechanicThreadPage.ts: A Q&A thread page for a mechanic post that displays the original question with tags and image, lists all comments as answers, and provides an input to submit a new answer.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Renders a messaging page listing all unique community members (derived from posts) as conversation entry points. Clicking a user navigates to their direct message conversation thread.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows a user profile page with avatar, follow/unfollow controls, and tabbed views for posts, reels, and builds. Supports both own-profile and other-user views with an edit profile modal for the current user.
frontend/src/pages/ReelsPage.tsx: Implements a vertical snap-scrolling reels feed where each reel displays a full-screen image with like, comment, share, and follow actions. Uses active-item tracking to highlight the currently visible reel.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routing, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palettes (amber, asphalt, chart, sidebar), custom fonts (Rajdhani, Inter), CSS variable-based semantic colors, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 11) for RevReel, a car-enthusiast social media app, including architectural notes, existing features, known issues, and image requirements.
